Incredible game, perfectly balanced.

However; my game has started to crash a lot. Nearly every match. When I restart my game to join the match again, I get an error saying I don't have an authorized ticket to join the server. This has ruined my experience as of so far and I dont want to play this shit for a while.

Fix it Valve. We give you more money than you could ever spend.
